ngiemboon: Ntáʼ kẅíŋ té ndá mèŋ wɔ́.
en: I don't have a few pieces of wood in my house.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n těen ḿpfɛ́ɛ mbab kúnɔ̀ɔn wɔ́.
Múɔ wɔɔn aa těen ńnáa mmó né míŋ nyìŋ ndyɛ̀ʼɛ wɔ́.
en: This child never gives things to someone else's child.

ngiemboon: À la néŋe ntegé légè mekú pɔ̀ɔn, ńná né mèŋ.
en: He had put the bean mixture in the bag to give to me.

ngiemboon: Anò gwɔ́ pɔ́ ngie nzsǒ yɔ̀ɔn gwɔ́ ye ntěm.
en: As long as my suit is sewn.
